events.title: Summer Music Festival
events.description: Join us for a weekend of amazing music performances from top artists across multiple genres. Food vendors, art installations, and more!

events.title: Tech Conference 2025
events.description: The biggest tech conference of the year featuring keynotes from industry leaders, workshops, networking opportunities, and product showcases.

events.title: Food & Wine Festival
events.description: Sample delicious cuisine from top chefs and taste premium wines from around the world. Cooking demonstrations, tastings, and more!

events.title: Marathon for Charity
events.description: Run for a cause! Join thousands of participants in this annual marathon to raise funds for local charities. All fitness levels welcome.

events.title: Art Exhibition Opening
events.description: Be among the first to see this stunning collection of contemporary art from emerging artists. Meet the artists and enjoy complimentary refreshments.
events.address: LA Contemporary Art Museum, Los Angeles, CA

events.title: Business Networking Mixer
events.description: Connect with professionals in your industry at this casual networking event. Perfect for making new contacts and exploring business opportunities.
events.address: The Grand Hotel, New York, NY

events.title: Film Festival
events.description: A celebration of independent cinema featuring screenings, director Q&As, and workshops. Discover the next generation of filmmaking talent!

events.title: Health & Wellness Expo
events.description: Explore the latest in health, fitness, and wellness. Free health screenings, product samples, demonstrations, and expert talks.

events.title: Family Fun Day
events.description: A day of activities for the whole family! Games, rides, entertainment, food, and more. Create memories that will last a lifetime.

events.title: Science & Technology Fair
events.description: Interactive exhibits, demonstrations, and presentations showcasing the latest innovations in science and technology. Great for all ages!
